20110124050024.000|20110124050028.000|CC1|IN OUR HEALTH SERVICE.

20110124050032.000|20110124050034.000|CC1|ORGANIZATIONS TO COME INTO THE  
20110124050034.000|20110124050037.000|CC1|NHS.

20110124050053.000|20110124050054.000|CC1|RISING AND EMPLOYMENT IS

20110124050104.000|20110124050122.000|CC1|PROGRAM.

20110124050128.000|20110124050129.000|CC1|PICTURES.

20110124050131.000|20110124050132.000|CC1|FOR THE THIRD MONTH IN A ROW,   
20110124050132.000|20110124050132.000|CC1|THE NUMBER OF VACANCIES IS UP

20110124050135.000|20110124050136.000|CC1|TODAY SEES GROWTH REVISED

20110124050242.000|20110124050256.000|CC1|BADLY TARGETED AND DID NOT WORK.

20110124050258.000|20110124050259.000|CC1|FUTURE JOBS FUND.

20110124050301.000|20110124050302.000|CC1|EXPENSIVE THAN SOME OTHER       
20110124050302.000|20110124050302.000|CC1|EMPLOYMENT PROGRAMS, IT LASTED  
20110124050302.000|20110124050304.000|CC1|FOR SIX MONTHS AND, WITHIN ONE

20110124050305.000|20110124050307.000|CC1|WERE BACK ON BENEFITS.

20110124050309.000|20110124050310.000|CC1|THE FUTURE JOBS FUND WERE IN    
20110124050310.000|20110124050312.000|CC1|THE PRIVATE SECTOR.

20110124050315.000|20110124050316.000|CC1|JOBS IN THE PRIVATE SECTOR.

20110124050412.000|20110124050415.000|CC1|BIG CHOICE FOR THE LABOUR PARTY

20110124050432.000|20110124050436.000|CC1|POLICE FORCES IN WALES MUST CUT 
20110124050436.000|20110124050437.000|CC1|THEIR NUMBERS BY 1,600 POLICE

20110124050617.000|20110124050618.000|CC1|TO GET BACK TO THE PRINCIPLE

20110124050619.000|20110124050621.000|CC1|BE OFFERING PEOPLE A HAND UP

20110124050622.000|20110124050625.000|CC1|>> MY HONORABLE FRIEND IS

20110124050625.000|20110124050627.000|CC1|THIS IS A VERY BOLD AND RADICAL 
20110124050627.000|20110124050629.000|CC1|REFORM THAT BASICALLY WILL MEAN 
20110124050629.000|20110124050631.000|CC1|THAT EVERY SINGLE PERSON WHO IS 
20110124050631.000|20110124050632.000|CC1|ON WELFARE WILL ALWAYS BE       
20110124050632.000|20110124050633.000|CC1|BETTER OFF IN WORK OR ALWAYS    
20110124050633.000|20110124050635.000|CC1|BETTER OFF DOING MORE HOURS OF  
20110124050635.000|20110124050637.000|CC1|WORK.                           
20110124050637.000|20110124050638.000|CC1|EVEN THE OPPOSITION WOULD       
20110124050638.000|20110124050640.000|CC1|ACCEPT THAT SO MANY REFORMS HAVE
20110124050640.000|20110124050643.000|CC1|SIMPLY MOVED THE POVERTY TRAP UP
20110124050643.000|20110124050647.000|CC1|THE INCOME SCALE.               
20110124050647.000|20110124050649.000|CC1|WE SHOULD ALWAYS MAKE IT WORTH  
20110124050649.000|20110124050650.000|CC1|WHILE FOR PEOPLE TO WORK HARDER 
20110124050650.000|20110124050651.000|CC1|OR TO WORK MORE, AND THAT IS    
20110124050651.000|20110124050652.000|CC1|WHAT OUR REFORMS WILL DO.       
20110124050652.000|20110124050654.000|CC1|>> FUEL PRICES IN NORTHERN      
20110124050654.000|20110124050656.000|CC1|IRELAND CURRENTLY AVERAGE 135P  
20110124050656.000|20110124050657.000|CC1|PER LITRE AND RISING, FORCING   
20110124050657.000|20110124050659.000|CC1|MANY MOTORISTS TO GO INTO THE

20110124050702.000|20110124050703.000|CC1|MAJOR LOSS TO THE BRITISH       
20110124050703.000|20110124050704.000|CC1|EXCHEQUER.                      
20110124050704.000|20110124050706.000|CC1|BECAUSE OF THE LAND BORDER,     
20110124050706.000|20110124050708.000|CC1|WILL THE PRIME MINISTER

20110124050720.000|20110124050720.000|CC1|HONORABLE GENTLEMAN RAISES AND

20110124050735.000|20110124050736.000|CC1|MOTORISTS WITH THEIR FUEL AND   
20110124050736.000|20110124050738.000|CC1|MOTORING BILLS.

20110124050744.000|20110124050745.000|CC1|DUTY WERE ALL PUT THROUGH IN THE

20110124050753.000|20110124050754.000|CC1|TEACHING OF BRITISH HISTORY IN

20110124050800.000|20110124050801.000|CC1|POLITICAL HISTORY OF THE PAST   
20110124050801.000|20110124050802.000|CC1|13 YEARS IS WRITTEN, IT WILL    
20110124050802.000|20110124050803.000|CC1|ADVISE PUPILS TO BORROW, BORROW 
20110124050803.000|20110124050804.000|CC1|AND BORROW THROUGH THE BOOM, OR 
20110124050804.000|20110124050806.000|CC1|WILL IT ADVISE THEM TO LEARN    
20110124050806.000|20110124050808.000|CC1|FROM LABOUR'S MISTAKES?         
20110124050808.000|20110124050810.000|CC1|>> I HOPE WE CAN GET INTO THE   
20110124050810.000|20110124050812.000|CC1|CURRICULUM THE IDEA THAT WE     
20110124050812.000|20110124050813.000|CC1|SHOULD FIX THE ROOF WHILE THE   
20110124050813.000|20110124050814.000|CC1|SUN IS SHINING.

20110124051559.000|20110124051601.000|CC1|THAN MINE BECAUSE WE DO NOT     
20110124051601.000|20110124051602.000|CC1|HAVE A FAIR SYSTEM.

20110124051604.000|20110124051607.000|CC1|OUT.                            
20110124051607.000|20110124051609.000|CC1|>> DID MY RIGHT HONORABLE       
20110124051609.000|20110124051610.000|CC1|FRIEND TELL THE PRIME MINISTER  
20110124051610.000|20110124051614.000|CC1|OF FRANCE LAST WEEK THAT

20110124051616.000|20110124051617.000|CC1|CONTROL OF ITS ECONOMY BY THE

20110124051622.000|20110124051624.000|CC1|>> THE PRIME MINISTER HAS
